titleInput.label: Title
titleInput.maxLengthValidationError: Title can be max {{ max }} characters long!

teachingAssistantInput.label: Tutor
teachingAssistantInput.placeholder: Select a tutor that will be responsible for this group.
teachingAssistantInput.requiredValidationError: A tutorial groups needs a tutor assigned!
teachingAssistantInput.taHelp: You can search by typing into the field.

campusInput.label: Campus
campusInput.placeholder: Select a campus where this group meets.
campusInput.campusHelp: You can search for a campus used in other tutorial groups by typing into the field.
campusInput.maxLengthValidationError: Campus is limited to {{ max }} characters!

additionalInformationInput.label: Additional Information
additionalInformationInput.placeholder: Additional information about the tutorial group.
additionalInformationInput.maxLengthValidationError: Additional information is limited to {{ max }} characters!

isOnlineInput.label: Does this tutorial group meet online or offline?

deleteDialog.question: Are you sure to delete the Tutorial Group with title {{ title }}?
deleteDialog.confirm: Please enter the title of the tutorial group to confirm.

import.introText: This dialog can be used to import tutorial groups and their registrations from a CSV file.
import.dialogText: Each row must contain a tutorial group title. If you want to not only create tutorial groups but also register students, the row must contain a value for either matriculation number or login. This is needed to identify the student. Values for last and first name are optional.
import.importFailed: Please repair the file, it could not be read due to the following error:
import.withoutTitle: The following rows miss a tutorial group title:
import.noIdentificationInformation: The following rows specify a user but do not contain a login or registration number:
import.duplicatedRegistrationNumbers: The following registration numbers are assigned to multiple tutorial groups:
import.duplicatedLogins: The following logins are assigned to multiple tutorial groups:
import.label: ToDo

checkbox.label: Do you want to specify a header that marks registrations as confirmed?

statusHeaderInput.label: Status Header
statusHeaderInput.placeholder: Enter the header that contains the status of the registration. E.g. 'Place'
statusHeaderInput.maxLengthValidationError: Status Header is limited to {{ max }} characters!

fixedPlaceValueInput.label: Confirmed Value
fixedPlaceValueInput.placeholder: Enter the value that indicates a confirmed fixed place. E.g. 'Confirmed Place'
fixedPlaceValueInput.maxLengthValidationError: Confirmed Value is limited to {{ max }} characters!
